en.title: Project {{Intern}}
en.text: Developed an [[AI-powered workflow automation tool]] to generate impact analysis reports and presentations for new feature releases.
list: Implemented prompt-based LLM pipelines that analyze data extracted from Oracle Docs and user configuration files, generating customized impact summaries and business insights for each customer.
Achieved 80-85% accuracy in impact assessment while reducing manual reporting time from 1-2 weeks to under 30 minutes, streamlining the release preparation process.

Built an interactive release calendar dashboard showcasing annual release plans for Oracle SaaS Cloud Services Pillars (HCM and ERP), detailing monthly events and feature rollouts to enhance release visibility.
